name: Grant and Gronk
description:
The daring explorer Grant needs Gronk's help if he is to survive the perils ahead of him. Thing is, Gronk is a caveman living 300,000 years ago! 

3 UNIQUE PLANETS!

TIME TRAVEL WITH A PRESS OF A BUTTON!!

STATE-OF-THE-ART HYPER-REALISTIC RTX ENABLED GRAPHICS!!!

HOW WILL YOU CHANGE THE PAST TO REACH THE END ALIVE????

CONTROLS

Movement:
W : Jump
A/D : Left/Right

Actions:
R : Time Travel (Requires Temporal Coagulate collectable)
Travel between Past and Present, taking control of caveman Gronk to change the future by unlocking Planet Types.
E : Cycle Planet
Instantly cycle through the planet options unlocked

Created by:

Micah Kearny (Itch, Insta)
Shayne Johnson (Itch, Insta)
